eeth ape punchi sandiye ithama sundarayi.badawati, oowiti, wel, kamath, hen, kumbauru, ala, dola, eedandu, kala, kolani, willu, gahakola me hama deyinma poshitha ellawala paranagama punchi apata sundara paradisayak.

pruthugisin ha landesin shri lankawata handunwa dun wasthu widyathmaka, kala shilpa ha karmanthamaya kala kshethra gana mathaka satahan pamanak nowa drawyamaya sadhaka tharamak ho apa athara athi athara in samaharek ape jana jiwithaye mulbasa gena aththe eewa thawaduratath wideshiya mulanga lesa nosalakiya haki lesa lankeya bawata pathwimeni.
mema shakthi washeshaya labenuye nyashatika wiparyasa walini.
pasugiya kale ee andum andan indala mama asanipath wuna.
ohu bohoma nihathamani harima honda kenek.
eeta passe sinhala bauddhayanta pamanak waraprasala labena nithi paddhathi hada ganima niwaradi kriya piliwethak da?
ee wagema healiwud chithrapata sandaha upabhasha puhunukaruwek hatiyatath andru kapi penena karyabharayak itukala ayek.

ethumanta widyalaya nawa mawathakata gena emin du daruwange anagathaya shakthimath kirimata hakiwewayi upannada web kandayama, aaracharya mandalaya, anadhyayana karya mandalaya, aadi shishya sangamaya, demapiyan ha subhapathann prarthana karamu.
nawatha nayakathwaya bara ganima sambandhayen mathiws pawasanne puhunukaru hathurusinhage idiri wada piliwela sambandhayen thibu wishwasaya matha thaman ema thanathura nawatha bara gath bawayi.
ee gana katha kirimedi oba wisin sukara maddawa gana uputa ganimak palakala.
nathahoth warthamana sathya daththa matha padanam wi abhawya lesa ha satakapata lesa eewa anagathayata waradiyata pa්rakshepanaya karanawa.
ithin anith hamotama wage wahanayak ganna hinaya matath thibuna.
aya mosthara nirupana shilpiniyak wagema rangana shilpiniyak.
eetath wada mehi suwishesha lakshana gananawak daknata labe.
ee wagema labu manushya aathmaya thula gewana wayas sima yalith uda wenne naha.
me kella iskoledi mununa dena prashna ehema mata awith kiyanawa issara.

eheth, ira uda wu pasu eya, kele nam pahara dun thanaththa waradakaruweki. 5 ”yamek kumbauraka ho midi waththaka ho thamage mrugayata kanna ida harinne nam, ese nathnam uu liha dama thibiya di uu wena ayekuge kethaka kanne nam, ohu thamage kumbaurin ha midi waththen istharam kotasin alabhaya gewiya yuthu ya. 6 ”ginnak hatagena, katu panduruwalata awili goyam kola ho nokapu goyama ho kumbaura ho eyin dawi giyahoth ginna gana wagakiwayuthu thanaththa sampurna alabhaya gewiya yuthu ya. 7 ”yameku mudal ho badu ho prawesama pinisa wena kenekuta bara di, ohuge geyin eewa sorakam karanu laba sora asu wuwahoth ohu degunayak alabhaya gewiya yuthuyi. 8 sora asu nuwuwahoth, gehimiya thama asalwasiyage baduwalata atha nogasu bawata dewiyan wahanse idiriyehi diwurum diya yuthu ya. 9 ”wishwasaya kada kirimaka di eya goneku gana ho kotaluweku gana ho bataluweku gana ho wasthra gana ho nathi wu wenath yamak gana ho we wa, wena ayek eya ‘mage ya’yi kiya gani nam depakshaye naduwa dewiyan wahanse wetha gena ya yuthu ya.

abhidharmaye ena ‘sabba chiththa sadharana chaithasika’ yana padaya waradawa ganna niwedakaya wisin ‘sabba chiththa sadharana sitha’ yanuwen wadasatahana pura than kihipayakadima sandahan karanne abhidharmaye kothanakawath nodakwena sithaki.

mita amatharawa landan bauddha wiharaya kendra kara ganimin unwahanse kriyathmaka kala therawada bududahama lowa wata prachalitha karalime suwisal dharmadutha sewaya agaya karamin miyanmar rajaya wisin " agga maha jothika dhaja" gaurawa namayada thayilanthaye maha chulalankara wishwa widyalaya wisin " dhammadhutha wisharada" namayada wajiragnyana nahimiyan wetha pudakaranu labiya.

ikuth 19 wanida balapitiya walithara mahakappa simamalakayata raswu sudharmakaraka sabhawe nayaka himiwarunge eekamathika kamaththen ahungalle siri silawisuddhi nahimi uktha padawiyata thora pathkara gena atha. 1970 di thrikunamalaya disthrikkaye athidushkara pradeshayak wu kuchchaweli pradeshayata wadama kala ahungalle siri silawisuddhi nahimiyo abauddhayan bahula me pradeshaye bauddha natabun aaraksha kara ganimatath sembimale - masanwawa, samudragiri pichchamal wiharaya pilisakara kirimatath piyawara gathha. 1985 di koti thrasthawadin wisin kuchchaweli polisiyata prahara ella kirimedi sila wisuddhi himiyo da wedi praharayakata lakwi thuwala labuha.

mohuge suwisheshi lakshanayak wuwe game palpathatath, waththe layimatath, nagare maduratath samawa ahumkan dimaya.siya piyage adipare yamin thamantamaya kiya deshapalana mawathak wiwara karagath susantha punchinilame mahathata thibu lokuma shakthiya gilihi giye 1993 juli masa 18 wana dinaya.
esema ohuge rajaya maha parimana rajya mudal wancha kirima pilibanda barapathala chodana ella wi thibena atharadi.
